name: WALLER CORPORATION, Appellee v. WARREN PLAZA, INC., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Waller Corp. v. Warren Plaza, Inc.

parties: WALLER CORPORATION, Appellee v. WARREN PLAZA, INC., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John A. Bacharach, Esq., for Warren Plaza, Inc.
Marcia Lynn Telek DePaula, Esq., Adam Stephen Ennis, Esq., Steptoe & Johnson PLLC, Canonsburg, for Waller Corporation.
casebody.head_matter:
129 A.3d 512
WALLER CORPORATION, Appellee v. WARREN PLAZA, INC., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 6, 2015.
Decided Dec. 21, 2015.
John A. Bacharach, Esq., for Warren Plaza, Inc.
Marcia Lynn Telek DePaula, Esq., Adam Stephen Ennis, Esq., Steptoe & Johnson PLLC, Canonsburg, for Waller Corporation.
